title: Inner class has a scope annotation but it must be ignored per the CDI rules

labels.name: triage/needs-reproducer
labels.description: We are waiting for a reproducer.

body:
**Describe the issue**
When having a class that is having an inner class compilation is failing.
The issue came when upgrading quarkus version to 2.x.x, earlier it was building and working properly.
 
```
@ApplicationScoped
public class CollectorCredentialCache {
.....

    public class CollectorCredentialCacheLoader extends CacheLoader<String, CollectorCredential> {
    .....
    }
}
```

Build Failing with error:

```
java.lang.RuntimeException: java.lang.RuntimeException: io.quarkus.builder.BuildException: Build failure: Build failed due to errors
```
